name: Ibuprofen
description: Ibuprofen is a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) commonly used to relieve pain, inflammation, and reduce fever.

name: Amoxicillin
description: Amoxicillin is an antibiotic used to treat a wide variety of bacterial infections.

name: Cetirizine
description: Cetirizine is an antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms such as watery eyes, runny nose, and sneezing.

name: Aspirin
description: Aspirin is used to reduce fever, pain, and inflammation, and it is also used as a blood thinner.

name: Lisinopril
description: Lisinopril is an ACE inhibitor used to treat high blood pressure and heart failure.

name: Metformin
description: Metformin is commonly prescribed for managing type 2 diabetes by controlling blood sugar levels.

name: Omeprazole
description: Omeprazole is a proton pump inhibitor (PPI) used to treat acid reflux, GERD, and stomach ulcers.

name: Amlodipine
description: Amlodipine is a calcium channel blocker used to treat high blood pressure and chest pain (angina).

name: Atorvastatin
description: Atorvastatin is used to lower cholesterol and reduce the risk of heart disease.

name: Ciprofloxacin
description: Ciprofloxacin is an antibiotic used to treat a variety of bacterial infections, especially urinary tract infections.

name: Gabapentin
description: Gabapentin is used to treat nerve pain and seizures.

name: Clopidogrel
description: Clopidogrel is a blood thinner used to prevent blood clots after a heart attack or stroke.

name: Tramadol
description: Tramadol is a pain reliever used to treat moderate to severe pain.

name: Levothyroxine
description: Levothyroxine is used to treat hypothyroidism by replacing thyroid hormone.

name: Simvastatin
description: Simvastatin is used to lower cholesterol and reduce the risk of heart disease.

name: Losartan
description: Losartan is an angiotensin receptor blocker (ARB) used to treat high blood pressure.

name: Prednisone
description: Prednisone is a corticosteroid used to treat conditions such as asthma, allergies, and arthritis.

name: Hydrochlorothiazide
description: Hydrochlorothiazide is a diuretic used to treat high blood pressure and fluid retention.

name: Azithromycin
description: Azithromycin is an antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections like respiratory infections and STIs.

name: Pantoprazole
description: Pantoprazole is a proton pump inhibitor (PPI) used to treat GERD and stomach acid-related issues.

name: Furosemide
description: Furosemide is a diuretic used to treat edema and high blood pressure.

name: Metoprolol
description: Metoprolol is a beta-blocker used to treat high blood pressure, chest pain, and heart conditions.

name: Zolpidem
description: Zolpidem is used to treat insomnia by helping with sleep onset.

name: Ranitidine
description: Ranitidine is used to reduce stomach acid and treat conditions such as ulcers and GERD.

name: Fluoxetine
description: Fluoxetine is an antidepressant used to treat depression, OCD, and panic disorders.

name: Esomeprazole
description: Esomeprazole is a proton pump inhibitor (PPI) used to treat acid reflux and heartburn.

name: Tamsulosin
description: Tamsulosin is used to treat the symptoms of an enlarged prostate (benign prostatic hyperplasia - BPH).

name: Clarithromycin
description: Clarithromycin is an antibiotic used to treat respiratory tract infections and skin infections.

name: Carbamazepine
description: Carbamazepine is used to treat seizures, nerve pain, and bipolar disorder.

name: Hydrocodone
description: Hydrocodone is a pain reliever used to treat severe pain, often combined with acetaminophen.

name: Warfarin
description: Warfarin is an anticoagulant (blood thinner) used to prevent blood clots.

name: Spironolactone
description: Spironolactone is a diuretic used to treat fluid retention and high blood pressure.

name: Doxycycline
description: Doxycycline is an antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections, including acne and respiratory infections.

name: Lorazepam
description: Lorazepam is used to treat anxiety disorders and insomnia.

name: Allopurinol
description: Allopurinol is used to treat gout and kidney stones by lowering uric acid levels.

name: Montelukast
description: Montelukast is used to prevent asthma attacks and to relieve seasonal allergy symptoms.

name: Diazepam
description: Diazepam is used to treat anxiety, muscle spasms, and seizures.

name: Methotrexate
description: Methotrexate is used to treat certain types of cancer and autoimmune diseases such as rheumatoid arthritis.

name: Rivaroxaban
description: Rivaroxaban is an anticoagulant used to prevent and treat blood clots.

name: Alprazolam
description: Alprazolam is used to treat anxiety and panic disorders.

name: Sertraline
description: Sertraline is an antidepressant in the SSRI class used to treat depression, anxiety, and obsessive-compulsive disorder.

name: Acetaminophen
description: Acetaminophen is a pain reliever and fever reducer used to treat mild to moderate pain and reduce fever.

name: Escitalopram
description: Escitalopram is an antidepressant used to treat depression and generalized anxiety disorder.

name: Naproxen
description: Naproxen is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to relieve pain, tenderness, swelling, and stiffness.

name: Metoclopramide
description: Metoclopramide is used to treat gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) and to prevent nausea and vomiting.
